src.model.aiutilities package¶

Submodules¶

src.model.aiutilities.aiutilities module¶

Utilities to interact with OpenAI’s models.

This includes the generation of text via GPT-3, and the generation of images using DALLE. The background is saved to view/assets as “gamebg.png”. Usage:

configure_openai() generate_monolith(“tragic”, “Roman”) generate_background(“jungle”)

src.model.aiutilities.aiutilities.configure_openai() → None¶

Configures the OpenAI module with the API key from environment variables.

src.model.aiutilities.aiutilities.generate_background(theme: str) → None¶

Generates a PNG file to be used as the game’s background, one-time.

Parameters:

theme – The theme of the background.

async src.model.aiutilities.aiutilities.generate_background_async(theme: str, index: int) → None¶
src.model.aiutilities.aiutilities.generate_monolith(emotion: str, theme: str) → list¶

Generates a list containing a story to be written on monoliths as inscriptions.

Parameters:

  • emotion – The emotion of the story’s ending.

  • theme – The theme of the story.

Returns:

A list containing individual lines in the story. Each item is one sentence.
